If youre searching for a safe and stylish way to accessorise your little ones bedroom, then you will love the ease and elegance of this practical, electric roller blind. Product id: db-erbx2212 fabric colour: disney toy story material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention blackout: yes disney collection disney pixar toy story electric roller blind in white/multicoloured.
